name: G! Boutique Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel is a gem hiding amongst the houses!
reviews.title: Exceeded expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Loved our room, loved our stay Breakfast was excellent.
reviews.title: An amazing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the best hotel I have ever visited. A beautiful room coupled with incredible customer service. Could not recommend the hotel more!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

description: Welcome to the latest - and funkiest – boutique hotel in Portsmouth and Southsea - G! Boutique Hotel. Each room is unique, personal, quirky, original and the hotel benefits from a stunning guest lounge, funky cellar-bar, and a unique feel to all aspects of the ambiance, look and service. Rooms include Luxury buffet/a la carte breakfast, free wifi broadband, wide-screen Freeview HD TVs in all the rooms, premium complimentary bathroom products and free parking.
